name: Krion Conquest, The [NES]
description: The Krion Conquest, known in Japan as Magical Kids Doropie (まじかるキッズどろぴー, Majikaru Kizzu Doropī), or more simply Magical Doropie (まじかるどろぴー), is a side-scrolling action-adventure video game for the Nintendo Entertainment System, developed by Vic Tokai in 1990. Later, Genki Mobile ported the game to Japanese mobile phones.
